results.title: Electrical fitting and installation
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film. Shows the installation and maintenance of electrical equipment by electrical fitters and mechanics. Discusses the opportunities in this field in Australia.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film. Shows the installation and maintenance of electrical equipment by electrical fitters and mechanics. Discusses the opportunities in this field in Australia.

results.title: Ask an Australian about surfing [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised Note: In Turkish.
results.description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised Note: In Turkish.
description_for_label: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised Note: In Turkish.

results.title: Commercial art
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Several years of full-time study requiring imagination, patience and the ability to express ideas in words, as well as in pictures. Stresses that even after training, a job may be hard to find. Shows a young artist in an advertising agency learning to accept criticism of simple jobs, before moving on to more demanding work.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Several years of full-time study requiring imagination, patience and the ability to express ideas in words, as well as in pictures. Stresses that even after training, a job may be hard to find. Shows a young artist in an advertising agency learning to accept criticism of simple jobs, before moving on to more demanding work.

results.title: Clerical work
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
This is a field of work with many opportunities: secretaries, optometrists, general clerks, receptionists, bank teller, enquiry clerk, accountant and section head. Shows that with machines performing the monotonous jobs, todays office work is concerned more with planning and people. Part of the “Is this your career?”series.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
This is a field of work with many opportunities: secretaries, optometrists, general clerks, receptionists, bank teller, enquiry clerk, accountant and section head. Shows that with machines performing the monotonous jobs, todays office work is concerned more with planning and people. Part of the “Is this your career?”series.

results.creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Spanish.

results.title: Civil engineering
results.creator_credit: Mutual Life and Citizens' Assurance Co. and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
By showing civil engineers at work, the wide ramifications of their profession are indicated, from specialists in investigation, to those who handle design, detailed planning, or administration. The need for mathematical ability, and an understanding of the properties of materials emerges.

results.title: Chemical engineering
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The chemical engineer applies engineering principles for chemical purposes, and works with the chemist and mechanical engineer. The design, erection and economical operation of chemical plants is his responsibility. He may have to analyse much data and prepare reports on plant operation. His grasp of maths must be strong and the computer is one of his tools. The university course indicates the wide field covered by his training.
results.description:

results.title: Ask an Australian about surfing [Serbo Croat version]
results.creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Serbo Croatian.
results.title_for_label: Ask an Australian about surfing [Serbo Croat version]
results.description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Serbo Croatian.

results.title: Catering and hotel management
results.creator_credit: Mutual Life and Citizens' Assurance Co. and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Good catering entails the management and supervision of staff, and the bulk ordering and preparation of food. The various applications of this work in hospitals, canteens and hotels demonstrates the degree of skilled knowledge which is required.
